sub_title: PhD (Environmental Engineering), IIT Delhi | Assistant Professor | Environmental Scientist | Climate, Environmental Quality and Sustainability
summary:
Dr. Praveen Babu is an environmental practitioner with more than 6 years (post-PhD) of experience in research, reporting, program management, EHS, ESG risks, climate, environmental quality and sustainability.

Skills and Knowledge:
1. Technical knowledge on environmental and occupational health, safety (EHS), and wellbeing processes for an organization, Environmental Social Governance (ESG) management systems and environmental sustainability.
2. Hands-on experience in identifying ESG concerns, recommending, and driving mitigation actions for ESG processes and practices. Analytical knowledge on the strategic impact of climate change and other EHS/ESG trends.
3. Exposure to Environmental Sustainability initiatives and reporting including environmental data, carbon accounting and framework. Experienced in reporting on sustainability and greenhouse gas emissions.
4. Working knowledge of environmental health safety standards ISO 14001 & ISO 45001.
5. Good digital skills in Python/Microsoft Power BI/SPSS (Statistical Analysis)/Origin (Scientific Graphing and Data Analysis Software) and manage large data sets (analysis/visualization). 

To get in touch, please write to
civilengg.praveen@gmail.com

projects.title: Evaluation of Indoor Air Quality in Underground Metro Station Platforms: A Case Study in Delhi City
projects.description: My research mainly focused on to evaluate the indoor/outdoor air quality, personal exposure, physical and chemical characterization of particulates and ventilation effectiveness by carrying out the environmental monitoring, modeling and developing management protocol for analyzing spatial and temporal variations within selected underground metro station platforms in Delhi Metro Rail Systems. It is a collaborated research project with IIT Delhi and Delhi Metro Rail Corporation Ltd., This is the first comprehensive indoor air quality and ventilation effectiveness study which carried out in Delhi Metro Rail System so for.

profile_positions.description:
Skills: Teaching, research, industry engagement and professional activities of the Faculty of Engineering. Establish funding streams to support research portfolio and enhance the intra-departmental collaboration efforts of the faculty.

Personal Website: https://civilenggpraveen.wixsite.com/praveenbabu

Official Website: https://amity.edu/faculty-detail.aspx?facultyID=1558
profile_positions.title: Assistant Professor (Senior Grade)

profile_positions.description:
Brief Description of Duties:
1. Environmental system management, it includes indoor/outdoor air quality monitoring, modeling
and management at selected underground metro station in Delhi Metro Rail System (DMRC), 
2. Co-ordinate and providing technical support for environmental related problems in selected underground metro stations in Delhi city during environmental monitoring in Delhi Metro Rail System, 
3. Preparing technical and environmental reports to ensure air quality and ventilation systems compliance with acceptable/standard environmental regulation limits,
4. Co-ordinate and assist in providing technical support for conducting technical and in administrative events,
5. Teaching assistant to under-graduate (UG) and post-graduate (PG) students, 
6. Conducting practical classes on Environmental Monitoring/Air Pollution Monitoring to UG and
PG students of Civil/Environmental Engg., at IIT Delhi.
profile_positions.title: Senior Research Fellow

profile_positions.description:
1. Preparation/development of research proposal to carryout systematic indoor/outdoor air pollution level at selected underground metro stations.
2. My research mainly focused on to evaluate the indoor/outdoor air quality and ventilation effectiveness by carrying out the environmental monitoring, modeling and developing
management protocol for analyzing spatial and temporal variations within selected underground
metro station platforms in Delhi Metro Rail Systems, 
3. It is a collaborated research project with IIT Delhi and Delhi Metro Rail Corporation (DMRC) Ltd., 4. This is the first comprehensive indoor air quality and ventilation effectiveness study which carried out in Delhi Metro System, and
5. Co-ordinate and providing technical support for environmental monitoring in Delhi Metro Rail System.
profile_positions.title: Junior Research Fellow

volunteer_experiences.description:
I served in Sustainable IIT Delhi as a Green Office Advisory Board member to make IIT Delhi campus greener, sustainable and self-sufficient and to minimize our impact on the environment; To ensure a green and healthy environment for people living within the campus; To identify various environment problems around us and address them through the most effective solutions; To encourage research in green technology; To make IIT Delhi community aware about the various environment problems around us and to encourage them to practice sustainable lifestyle.
Website: http://sustainable.iitd.ac.in/
